head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BAMBRICK, MARY A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BAMBRICK, MARY A.

block.p: BAMBRICK-Mary A. Of Rosedale, NY on January 30, 2003. Loving wife of Eugene P., beloved mother of Eugene P., Jr., Mary Ellen, Peter J., Julianne, Alicia and Gerard B., cherished grandmother of seven. Fond sister of the late Peter W. Thompson, Jr. Friends may call on Sunday at the O'Reilly Funeral Home. 137-40 Brookville Blvd, Rosedale from 2 to 4 and 7 to 9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial at St. Clare RC Church Monday at 9:30 AM. Interment St. John's Cemetery, Middle Village, NY
